revised_title: Tides Research: Diurnal Inequality-Wave Progress along European Coasts
tldr: This research investigates the progress of the diurnal inequality-wave along the coasts of Europe. The author, William Whewell, studied the laws governing the height of high water and observed that these laws are modified by local circumstances. He analyzed observations made at nineteen different stations, concluding that the differences in diurnal inequalities do not form a progressive series.
